name: Diabolist

skills.name: Torment
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 10% chance of placing a [Sleep] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Electric Storm
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Positive Charge
skills.raw_description:
Fills the Turn Meter of all allies by 15%. Decreases the Turn Meter of all enemies by 15%.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1

faction.raw_description: Beyond the dark portal lies a realm of fire and darkness. It is thehome of ancient beings born of darkness. Forbidden fromsetting foot in the fair lands of Teleria, these foul entities haveconspired with Necromancers to breed Demonspawn - unholyunions of Demon and mortal
